text: Helpful note: Probably bring some cash on you instead of just credit/debit cards! Just in case!
James and I will also be printing maps for drivers because we will not have cell service after getting off of I-40

so some rumors about this being near a bear sanctuary, just some tips: leave all food and scented items (soap, deodorant, etc) in the car over night, also, bears are really just big raccoons, if you see one just yell "hey you get out of here" and start flailing your arms like one of those dancing things car dealerships use and the bears should be scared and run away, if we're making noise they'll stay away
Bear sanctuary? What????
rumors
But.....bears.....
just run faster than everyone else <@U1L7E8GSU>
good thing i did trx this week
<@U1L7E8GSU> NC’s black bears are really non-aggressive unless provoked. Just don’t go poking it if you see one
<@U1KRB11QC> wait you're not supposed to poke bears?
<https://media.giphy.com/media/5UON8MBHqHWF2/giphy.gif>
exactly <@U1KRB11QC>. There are a million people around. We won't have any issues
I'm going to just take <@U1KT5F4SZ> 's advice and run faster than all of you.  Or at least one person.  Even if I have to knock that person down :slightly_smiling_face:
Don't get between momma bear and her cubs

*Who are we sacrificing to the bears*

:one: Tommy
:two: Someone Else
^LOL wut
<!channel> reminder to pay the piper today if you haven’t already so James and I can make sure we’ll have food for tomorrow.
<@U1KQTJ6BV|andreazadia> has left the channel
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vT_PNKg3v7s>

attachments.title: Snowboarder Girl Chased By Bear - I Was Singing Rihanna Work And Didn't Know It Was Behind Me!

text: fake. cgi
hey ill need a ride tmrw. can someone give me a lift?
<@U1KS4UE2F> I’ll have room and <@U1KRZT11T> may also have room
I think both hike groups will be leaving at 6AM now to make things easier. More info to come
Yea whoever needs a lift

Friday Camping Update:

Parking Update: Plan to meet at WolfRidge instead of at the IAA because parking is bountiful for those leaving their cars overnight. (1910 Entrepreneur Dr. -->See Map:<https://drive.google.com/open?id=1ZblGeb6rbFoEP2SgEc9SeJwS2Oc&usp=sharing>)

Carpools: Both groups will now be meeting up at 6:00 AM. This will make things simpler logistically in case someone gets lost along the way. 

General Packing List: Backpack, Snacks for the hike + breakfast Saturday, Water bottles (we will be at a higher elevation which will cause you to consume twice your average amount of water), Layers of clothing of all sorts, Extra shoes, External batteries for your phones, Flashlights.

Weather Update: At Mt. Mitchell, the weather over the last 3 days has been a high of 55 around mid-day and a low of 44 at night. Make sure you have what you need in order to be comfortable. 

Payment: See James or David if you have not paid yet. 

Here’s our numbers if you need anything!
James <tel:(928)699-3668|(928) 699-3668>
David <tel:(704)222-9512|(704) 222-9512>
Do we need charcoal or anything like that for the fire/cooking?
<@U1KRB11QC> thanks for organizing everything! you're a champ!
(and <@U1L5GU954> )
<@U1L5GU954> and James!
<@U1L6WB44A> James and I are picking some up this afternoon. Were going to handle main food/sides, but everyone is more than welcome to make delicious desserts. We will have smores stuff too!
We have a bag of charcoal I can throw in as well! We probably won't ever use it otherwise.
<@U1L6WB44A> savings in charcoal translates to more beer
Excellent!

text: <@U1KRB11QC|dsjorda2> pinned a message to this channel.
What about firewood?  Do we need firewood?
<@U1L7E8GSU> we were planning on purchasing some at the camp or burning what we could scavenge, but anyone is welcome to bring some extra
we should make sure we have at least one starter log, it's supposed to rain there the night before and we don't want to have to be trying to start damp logs
nobody wants to deal with an annoyingly smokey fire
Or doritos, doritos are really good kindling
i have a bunch of kindling i can bring
lint rolls are great for starting fires
True, don't want to waste doritos on a fire
<@U1L7E8GSU> i didn't know that, have now learned one thing today
Unless they are the fire doritos
That's true, then it's only fitting.
How many burgers are we going to have? 1 per person?
<@U1LMHQY9E>: at least a burger and hotdog for everyone. Plus extra
word! i got some snack stuff too, more than willing to share
